section.title: DisplayConfig Struct Reference

para.para: Struct to hold display configuration settings.

listitem.para: dispResW - the width of the display resolution.
dispResH - the height of the display resolution.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Struct to hold display configuration settings.

note.title: Note
note.para: It uses atomic types for thread-safe access to these values.
This struct is used in the Config class to define display configuration settings.

formalpara.title: See also
formalpara.para: dispResW - the width of the display resolution.
dispResH - the height of the display resolution.
fps - the frames per second of the display.
